benchmark_details.name: FollowBench (Multi-level Fine-grained Constraints Following Benchmark)
benchmark_details.overview: FollowBench is a benchmark designed to comprehensively assess the instruction-following capabilities of Large Language Models (LLMs) by incorporating five different types of fine-grained constraints. It employs a novel multi-level mechanism that adds constraints incrementally to evaluate models on various difficulties.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a precise and comprehensive evaluation of instruction-following capabilities in LLMs.

data.source: Curated dataset with instructions based on various NLP tasks.
data.annotation: Manual and automated verification by experts.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the proportion of constraints satisfied in the instructions evaluated.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better adherence to constraints by LLMs.

harm: Potential for biased outputs based on the instructions provided.
